itunes:title: How an Editor Acquires a Manuscript
title: How an Editor Acquires a Manuscript
description: Author and host, Bianca Marais, takes you behind the scenes of publishing as she chats with editor, Kerri Kolen, about how editors acquire manuscripts; what the acquisition process looks like; how interminable the wait for news is; as well as how advances are calculated, how royalties work and Audible's opportunities that are available to authors.
content:encoded: Author and host, Bianca Marais, takes you behind the scenes of publishing as she chats with editor, Kerri Kolen, about how editors acquire manuscripts; what the acquisition process looks like; how interminable the wait for news is; as well as how advances are calculated, how royalties work and Audible's opportunities that are available to authors.
itunes:author: Bianca Marais and Kerri Kolen
itunes:keywords: editors, publishing, writers, advances, acquisition process, royalties, audible
